name: PizzaFast Delivery: The Game
description:
What's The Story?

Long ago, in the year 2033, humanity faced a terrible crisis: we were running out of gold! On the brink of extinction, humans were saved by several alien races who valued our mobile technology. But where did we stand in the universe? What was the purpose of our life?

To create pizza, of course! Ah, yes, the delicate savory treat that no other species can replicate. You play as a pizza-cooking robot by the name of Sue-V who’s been dropped off at one of the many PizzaFast store locations. Your task is to save the world from the influence of the evil Alfredo’s Pizza!

This is just a battle “proof of concept” demo. Very short indeed! Give feedback on the Discord server: https://discord.gg/EYXtdGG

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Ok/Interact

X: Cancel

C: Menu
